--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Watching Hydras with a blank expression. 
> 
> "My opinion, Hydras.. is trust no one. If you value your 
existance."  
> pausing. "Either way, someone needs to be sent out to collect 
intelligence on this 
> certain being... find out who he is, why he is here & what he 
wants with you. 
> THEN you can terminate him."
